titles.title: A resolution to authorize the printing of a revised edition of the Senate Rules and Manual.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/31/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Requires the Committee on Rules and Administration to: (1) prepare a revised edition of the Senate Rules and Manual; and (2) print it as a Senate document, including 1,500 additional copies beyond the usual number.
